table.title: First Time Access - Last 7 days
table.searchTemplate: | `access_tracker` | eval _time=firstTime | `daysago(7)` | search $bunit$ $category$ | stats min(firstTime) as firstTime,max(lastTime) as lastTime,values(dest) as dest by user | sort - firstTime | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | fields firstTime,lastTime,user,dest

table.title: Completely Inactive Accounts - Last 90 days
table.searchTemplate: | `inactive_accounts(90)` | search $bunit$ $category$ | `round(dayDiff)` | rename dayDiff as inactiveDays | sort + lastTime | `uitime(firstTime)` | `uitime(lastTime)` | table firstTime,lastTime,user,inactiveDays

table.title: Account Usage For Expired Identities - Last 7 days
table.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,values(Authentication.dest) as dest from datamodel=Authentication where * $dm_bunit$ $dm_category$ by Authentication.user | `drop_dm_object_name("Authentication")` | `get_identity4events(user)` | where isnotnull(user_endDate) | `mktime(user_endDate,"%m/%d/%y %H:%M")` | where _time>user_endDate | `uitime(user_endDate,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")` | fields _time,user,user_first,user_last,user_endDate,dest
